templates.template: Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud
templates.name: Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud

triggers.expression: (last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/agent.hostname,#1)<>last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/agent.hostname,#2))>0
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME}: Host name of zabbix_agentd was changed - INFORMATION

items.name: Agent ping
items.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for availability check.

triggers.expression: nodata(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/agent.ping,10m)=1
triggers.recovery_expression: nodata(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/agent.ping,10m)=0
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME}: Zabbix agent is unreachable - DISASTER

triggers.expression: (last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/agent.version,#1)<>last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/agent.version,#2))>0
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME}: Version of zabbix_agent(d) was changed - INFORMATION

triggers.expression: count(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/eventlog[Application,ThreadAvailable = 0,,,,,],1m,,"ThreadAvailable = 0")>1
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Event Viewer - {ITEM.VALUE} 1x in the last minute - HIGH

triggers.expression: count(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/eventlog[Application,ThreadAvailable = 0,,,,,],1m,,"ThreadAvailable = 0")>10
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Event Viewer - {ITEM.VALUE} more than 10x in the last minute - DISASTER

triggers.expression: min(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],1h)>=50
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Disk Queue Length is above 50 for more than 1 hour - AVERAGE

dependencies.name: {HOSTNAME} - Disk Queue Length is above 200 for more than 1 hour - HIGH
dependencies.expression: min(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],1h)>=200
dependencies.recovery_expression: max(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],30m)<200

dependencies.name: {HOSTNAME} - Disk Queue Length is above 500 for more than 30 minutes - DISASTER
dependencies.expression: min(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],30m)>=500
dependencies.recovery_expression: max(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],15m)<500

triggers.expression: min(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],1h)>=200
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Disk Queue Length is above 200 for more than 1 hour - HIGH

dependencies.name: {HOSTNAME} - Disk Queue Length is above 500 for more than 30 minutes - DISASTER
dependencies.expression: min(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],30m)>=500
dependencies.recovery_expression: max(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],15m)<500

triggers.expression: min(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\234(_Total)\1400],30m)>=500
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Disk Queue Length is above 500 for more than 30 minutes - DISASTER

items.name: PhysicalDisk: Avg. Disk Read Queue Length
PhysicalDisk: Avg. Disk Write Queue Length
items.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Write Queue Length

triggers.expression: avg(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\700(_Total)\702],8h)>50
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Average pagefile usage is more than 50% for more than 8 hours - AVERAGE

dependencies.name: {HOSTNAME} - Average pagefile usage is more than 90% for more then 1 hour - DISASTER

dependencies.recovery_expression: avg(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\700(_Total)\702],30m)<=90

dependencies.name: {HOSTNAME} - Average pagefile usage is than 70% for more then 1 hour - HIGH

dependencies.recovery_expression: avg(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/perf_counter[\700(_Total)\702],10m)<=70

triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} - Processor load is above 100 for more than 10 minutes - DISASTER

triggers.expression: avg(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/system.cpu.load[percpu,avg1],8h)>25

triggers.expression: nodata(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/system.cpu.util,10m)=1

triggers.name: {HOSTNAME}: Stopped recieving data (CPU) - DISASTER

triggers.expression: fuzzytime(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/system.localtime,180s)=0
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME} time is not synchronized with Zabbix Server - AVERAGE

triggers.expression: find(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/system.run["c:\Windows\System32\cscript.exe /nologo c:\Windows\System32\slmgr.vbs /xpr"],,"like","Notification mode")=1
triggers.name: {HOSTNAME}: Windows is not Activated - INFORMATION

triggers.expression: last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/system.uptime)<10m
triggers.recovery_expression: last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/system.uptime)>=8h
triggers.name: {HOST.NAME}: has just been restarted - DISASTER

dependencies.expression: last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree])<=1 and last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},free])>=0
dependencies.recovery_expression: last(/Olos - SO Windows Active - DTBs Cloud/vfs.fs.size[{#FSNAME},pfree])>1
